title: Bug 11863: Update Test Suite action does not allow removal
OB: When attempting to use the 'Update' action for Test Suite, there is no option to remove the existing content (dir, zip) and modify it. As a result, the update functionality is currently limited.
EB: To address this issue, I suggest renaming the action and the corresponding dialog to 'Recreate Test Suite'. This new name would better reflect the functionality and allow users to effectively modify the existing content.
SR: Update the 'Update' action and associated dialog to be named 'Recreate Test Suite'. This will enable users to modify and remove the existing content when necessary.
